Class Guest

java.lang.Object
ss.hotel.Guest
public class Guest extends Object
Hotel guest with a name and possibly a hotel room. A Guest may rent at most one Room at a time.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Guest(String name)
    Creates a Guest with the given name and without Room.

      Creates a Guest with the given name and without Room.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of this Guest.
      Returns:
      name of this Guest

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      Returns the Room rented by this Guest.
      Returns:
      Room rented by this Guest, or null if this Guest does not rent a Room

    • checkin

      public boolean checkin(Room room)
      Rents a Room to this Guest. This is only possible if:
      • this Guest does not already have a Room
      • the given Room is not already rented
      If the checkin succeeds, both sides of the association are updated:
      • this Guest gets the Room
      • the Room gets this Guest
      Parameters:
      room - Room to be rented to this Guest
      Returns:
      true if the checkin succeeded, false if this Guest already had a Room or the Room already had a Guest

    • checkout

      public boolean checkout()
      Checks this Guest out of the Room. The Guest will no longer rent a Room, and the Room will no longer refer to this Guest.
      Returns:
      true if the checkout succeeded, false if this Guest did not rent a Room

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the name of this Guest.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the name of this Guest
